original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘dīpiniyā ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamaṁ taṁ ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabban”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena dīpiniyāḥ ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti yam vadesi katamam tam ekam aṅgam gahetabbanti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, dīpinī sakiṁyeva gabbhaṁ gaṇhāti, na punappunaṁ purisaṁ upeti?
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja dīpinī sa kiyā iva gabbham gaṇhāti na punappunam purisam upeti

original: Evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena āyatiṁ paṭisandhiṁ uppattiṁ gabbhaseyyaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena āyatim paṭisandhim uppattim gabbhaseyya

original: cutiṁ bhedaṁ khayaṁ vināsaṁ saṁsārabhayaṁ duggatiṁ visamaṁ sampīḷitaṁ disvā ‘punabbhave
analyzed: cutim bhedam khayam vināsam sa sāra bhayam duggatim visamam sampīḍitam disvā punar bhave
na paṭisandahissāmi iti yonisas manasikāraḥ karaṇīyaḥ

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, dīpiniyā ekaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena suttanipāte dhaniyagopālakasutte—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena sutta nipāte dhaniya gopālaka sutte
atha ce patthayasi pavassa deva ati
